original_title: Doctor Who: Cybermen - The Early Years
overview: A documentary about the early years of the Cybermen. Introduced by Colin Baker, this includes several interviews and rare clips. Also included are four surviving episodes from the incomplete stories "The Moonbase" (episodes 2&4) and "The Wheel in Space" (episodes 3&6). A VHS classic!
title: Doctor Who: Cybermen - The Early Years
